name: GOGOCharters
0:
”Alexa, tell GOGO Charters I need to rent a private bus”
”Alexa, tell GOGO Charters I need a motor coach”
”Alexa, tell GOGO Charters I need to rent a bus for my event”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: go go charters
des:
Welcome to GOGO Charters — the next-generation bus reservation platform that’s dedicated to transparency and simplicity.

Private motor coach transportation is ideal for corporate groups, weddings, sports teams, government organizations, school events and entertainers. 

To get the most out of our Alexa Skill, be ready to provide the following trip information:

-Pickup City-
-Pickup Date-
-Number of Passengers-
-Drop off City-
-Phone Number-

You'll submit your information by saying, "Submit my information". Our reservation technology will then locate every bus company that is available to do your trip and contact with you a list of quotes.
